mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT b.`name` as brandname, s.`name` as shopname, s.id as shopid, s.phone, s.email, up.address, sp.business_licence, sp.tax_certificate, sp.account_permit, sp.organization_code, sp.corporate_identity, sp.corporate_identityB, sp.contract_image1, sp.contract_image2, '' as domain, CASE WHEN s.business_id = 1 THEN '家电' WHEN s.business_id = 2 THEN '家具' WHEN s.business_id = 3 THEN '家装' WHEN s.business_id = 4 THEN '家饰' WHEN s.business_id = 5 THEN '净水' END AS business, '正常' as `status` FROM brands b, shop_authorize_infos sai LEFT JOIN shop_paperworks sp on sai.shop_id=sp.shop_id INNER JOIN shops s on sai.shop_id=s.id INNER JOIN user_profiles up on s.user_id=up.user_id WHERE sai.json_authorize LIKE CONCAT('%',#{brandid},'%') AND sai.shop_id NOT IN ( SELECT shop_id FROM brands_club_key bck ) and b.id=#{brand_id}

SELECT b.`name` as brandname, s.`name` as shopname, s.id as shopid, s.phone, s.email, up.address, sp.business_licence, sp.tax_certificate, sp.account_permit, sp.organization_code, sp.corporate_identity, sp.corporate_identityB, sp.contract_image1, sp.contract_image2, '' as domain, CASE WHEN s.business_id = 1 THEN '家电' WHEN s.business_id = 2 THEN '家具' WHEN s.business_id = 3 THEN '家装' WHEN s.business_id = 4 THEN '家饰' WHEN s.business_id = 5 THEN '净水' END AS business, '正常' as `status` FROM brands b, shop_authorize_infos sai LEFT JOIN shop_paperworks sp on sai.shop_id=sp.shop_id INNER JOIN shops s on sai.shop_id=s.id INNER JOIN user_profiles up on s.user_id=up.user_id WHERE sai.json_authorize LIKE CONCAT('%',#{brandid},'%') AND sai.shop_id NOT IN ( SELECT shop_id FROM brands_club_key bck ) and b.id=#{brand_id} and s.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shopname},'%') GROUP BY s.id
